mentions.context: The used implementations of t-SNE and PCA in scikit-learn[16] accept, respectively, a distance and a similarity matrix.

More precisely, we considered the following models (and, specifically, their implementation in scikit-learn [16]), each described together with the hyperparameters involved in the model selection phase:
